actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to double the unified credit against estate and gift taxes and to provide an inflation adjustment of such credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified tax credit for both estate and gift taxes from $47,000 to $83,000, with inflation adjustments for every calendar year after 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to double the unified credit against estate and gift taxes and to provide an inflation adjustment of such credit.
